data.title: Bondi Outdoor Leadership
data.text:
We have a proven track record of providing effective and enjoyable organizational & leadership coaching, risk management assessments, and corporate group development adventure experiences.

If you currently oversee an outdoor program that takes people on outdoor adventures, like rock climbing, snowshoeing, backpacking, or mountain biking, it is key to have professional trainings on a regular basis.

Bondi Outdoor Leadership can build a custom training program based on your staffâ€™s abilities and needs. Let our highly trained staff ensure that your organization is operating with the most current wilderness instructor practices and industry-best techniques.

Reward your hard-working staff with a day out of the office in a unique mountain environment. A change of scenery and physical challenges will open your minds and bodies to new ways of interacting, communicating and problem solving.

Bondi Outdoor Leadership provides corporate experience-based team development programs with an emphasis on current leadership theories and practice, effective team communication, problem solving, and overall group development and cohesion.

The adventure piece of our programs often include a mix of rock climbing, rappelling, map and compass skills, intro to avalanche companion rescue, and wilderness first aid.

Combined with current leadership theories and practice, these custom programs make for a great team development experience.
